title: Earth's Structure and Plate Tectonics

vocab.definition: The theory that Earth's crust is made of moving plates
The hot, dense layer of rock beneath Earth's crust
Where two tectonic plates move toward each other
Where two tectonic plates move away from each other
Shaking of the ground caused by sudden movement of tectonic plates

teachingNotes: Use cross-section diagrams of Earth. Explain how plate movement causes earthquakes and volcanoes. Connect to real-world examples.
